title: A New England Nun - to show Louisa capable of

content.question: The second half of paragraph 2 (starting from the seventh sentence "Even now . . . as she." serves to show that Louisa was capable of

choices.label: directing a conversation with discretion and subtlety
being forceful when the occasion demanded it
fluctuating in her resolve yet maintaining appearances
sympathizing with others regardless of her own pain

content.answer: directing a conversation with discretion and subtlety
